resources.string: Gesüßtes, kohlensäurehaltiges Getränk (z. B. Coca Cola, Fanta)
Anderes gesüßtes Getränk (z. B. Caprisonne, Durstlöscher, Nestea)
Sportgetränk (z. B. Gatorade, Powerade, Isostar, Active O2)
Energy-Drinks (z. B. Red Bull, Monster, Rockstar)
Haben Sie das Akzelerometer schon angelegt?

string-array.name: survey1
string-array.item: I need something pleasant to make me feel better.
I feel drained.
If I were tempted by something right now, it would be very difficult to resist.
I would want to quit any difficult task I was given.
I feel calm and rational.
I cannot absorb any information right now.
I feel lazy.
I feel sharp and focused.
I want to give up.
I feel like my willpower is gone.

string-array.name: survey2
string-array.item: Since your last reply: I had a strong need to belong.
At this particular moment I have a strong need to belong.

string-array.name: survey3
string-array.item: At this particular moment I identify with/feel a connection to my fellow university students/friends/family.
Since your last reply: I have identified with/felt a connection to my fellow university students/friends/family.

string-array.name: survey4
string-array.item: Are other people present?
Since your last reply: Were other people present?
Are other physically present people drinking soft drinks?
Since your last reply: Were other physically present people drinking soft drinks?
Are other people present in some other medium (e.g., TV, radio, on the internet) drinking soft drinks?
Since your last reply: Were other people present in some other medium (e.g. TV, radio, on the internet) drinking soft drinks?

string-array.name: survey5
string-array.item: Since your last reply: How long did you watch TV and/or video/DVD/Blue-ray or video streaming services (e.g. Netflix)?
Since your last reply: How long did you use the internet? (Please disregard the time spent video and music streaming only.)
Since your last reply: How long did you sit at a computer/game console?
Since your last reply: How long did you actively play on a game console (e.g. Wii, PlayStation Move)?
Since your last reply: How long did you sit/work at a computer? (Please disregard the time spent with internet-use or video or music streaming only.)
Since your last reply: How much time did you spend on text messaging only?
Since your last reply: How long did you listen to music on your radio/mobile/streaming service only? (Please disregard the time spent while using the internet or the computer.)

resources.string: How do you feel at the moment?

string-array.name: survey6left
string-array.item: tired
content
agitated
full of energy
unwell
relaxed

string-array.name: survey6right
string-array.item: awake
discontent
calm
without energy
well
tense
